alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 07 at 1:48PM EDT until October 08 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Northwest Pocahontas and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
